title: Sophie Turner pokes fun at 'influencers' in hilarious Instagram story video
text:
Sophie Turner took to her Instagram story on Monday night, poking fun at social media 'influencers.'

The 23 year old Game of Thrones star got bundled up in winter gear, for what appeared at first to be a rather morose video from the actress.

It became clear quite quickly though that she was actually poking fun at so-called 'influencers' and the products they promote.

No influencer: Sophie Turner took to her Instagram story on Monday night, poking fun at social media 'influencers'

Turner was wearing a thick grey stocking hat with a puffy coat, along with a multi-colored scarf wrapped around her neck.

'Hey you guys, just kind of going for my influencer look today,' Turner said in the Instagram video, while using a convincing American accent.

She also used a filter on the video to make her cheeks rosier than usual, and lips more puffy, blasting teas and powders advertised on social media.

Influencer look: Turner was wearing a thick grey stocking hat with a puffy coat, along with a multi-colored scarf wrapped around her neck

'Today I just wanted to promote this new powdered stuff that you put in your tea, and basically it makes you s**t your brains out,' she said.

'(It) is totally really really bad for me to be promoting to young women and young people everywhere but I don’t really give a f**k because I’m getting paid money for it,' she added with a fake laugh.

She ended the video by throwing up a peace with grey gloved fingers and stating, 'Influencer life.'

Influencer life: She ended the video by throwing up a peace with grey gloved fingers and stating, 'Influencer life'

Turner's social media presence also lead to some playful trolling, by an NFL team no less.

The actress was at the NFL's International Series game at London's Wembley Stadium between the Chicago Bears and Oakland Raiders, and she appeared in videos and photos on the Bears' sideline, representing the NFC North team.

After the Raiders pulled off a come-from-behind win, the Raiders Twitter stated the ending of the game, 'had a better finish than Thrones,' referring to the show's controversial final episodes.

Trolling: Turner's social media presence also lead to some playful trolling, by an NFL team no less

Turner is coming off her eight-season run as Sansa Stark on HBO's Game of Thrones, which won Outstanding Drama Series at the Emmy Awards in September.

She also recently starred in Heavy, which had its world premiere in September at the Deauville Film Festival

The actress will next be seen in the upcoming dramatic thriller Broken Soldier, starring alongside Ray Liotta.

Sansa's goodbye: Turner is coming off her eight-season run as Sansa Stark on HBO's Game of Thrones, which won Outstanding Drama Series at the Emmy Awards in September
description: Sophie Turner took to her Instagram story on Monday night, poking fun at social media 'influencers.'
